text: @CNN Pence is much better than if CNN was put in charge of coronavirus. Imagine fake numbers, fake actions, fake treatments, with coward anchors asking for help not from dems but GOP and Pence. CNN think before throwing the first stone, your not that good any more. Lowest ratings ever

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
